settings.title: Product Features
settings.content:
• Versatile Digital Display: Easily select from multiple water flow modes and monitor water and battery levels with the user-friendly 'Paw Proof' interface.
  • Rechargeable & Stable: Our Anti-Tumble docking station ensures secure, hassle-free recharging for an ultra-stable cat fountain.
  • Whisper Quiet & Safe: Operates at just 20 Decibels for a peaceful environment and automatically stops at low water levels.
  • Multiple Flow Options: Choose from 4 settings, including continuous flow and motion-activated modes, for the perfect cat drinking experience.
  • Premium Materials: Crafted from 304-food-grade stainless steel and BPA-free materials, it's designed for cat health and features advanced four-layer filtration for water purity.

settings.title: Specifications
settings.content:
• Material: ABS (BPA-FREE)
  • Input: 100 – 240V 50/60Hz
  • Output: 5V 1A
  • Battery Capacity: 5000mAh
  • Battery Type: Li-Ion Battery Pack
  • Water Tank Capacity: 2.5L
  • Dimensions: 232 × 177 × 161mm / 9.1 × 7 × 6.3in
  • Net Weight: 990g / 2.18lb
  • Power Supply Mode: External power supply, Battery-operated

settings.title: Shipping Information
settings.content:
• Ground Shipping: Free for orders over $50, $6 for orders $0-$49.99 within the continental U.S. Orders typically ship within 5-8 business days after payment processing.
  • Pre-orders follow the estimated delivery time shown on the product page.
  • Click here to learn more about our shipping policy.

settings.title: Why should I consider using a cat water fountain?
settings.answer: Cat water fountains provide a continuous flow of fresh, filtered water, which can encourage your cat to drink more and stay hydrated. This is especially beneficial for cats prone to urinary tract issues.

settings.title: How often should I clean the cat water fountain?
settings.answer: It's recommended to clean the water fountain every 1-2 weeks. Regular cleaning prevents the buildup of dirt and ensures the water remains fresh and safe for your cat.

settings.title: What type of water should I use in the fountain?
settings.answer: You can use tap water, but it's advisable to use filtered water if your tap water has a strong taste or odor. Avoid using distilled water, as it lacks essential minerals.

settings.title: How noisy is the cat water fountain?
settings.answer: Most cat water fountains are designed to be quiet, but noise levels can vary. Look for models with low decibel ratings if you're concerned about noise disrupting your cat or your household.

settings.title: Do I need to replace filters, and how often?
settings.answer: Yes, you'll need to replace the filters in your cat water fountain periodically. The frequency depends on the model and how many pets use it, but it's generally recommended to replace filters every 2-4 weeks.
